title: 20 min low priority
body: So i was in a game but my internet was screwing up so i quickly reset it, i joined the game and played normal afterwards but when the game was over i  was put in 20 min low priority. WTF i joined back and this has been pissing me off. If i was afk for the whole game i understand but i was only gone to fix my lag. Dead set this is so bullshit waiting 20 mins for 5 games because i was gone for 5 mins fixing my net. Get your shit together riot.
